alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dooly; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 7:21AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dooly, southeastern Sumter and northern Crisp Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 721 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Desoto, or 13 miles southeast of Americus, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Vienna, Byromville, Pinehurst, Leslie, Lilly, De Soto, Desoto, Cobb, Lamar, Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, Richwood, Flint River Wma, Huntington, Drayton and Tremont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central and west central Georgia.
